text: Zemlyak ( is a Russian political movement which emerged in 1992, founded by Mikhail Lukyanov, advocating for Russia to return the Kuril Islands to Japan as it would benefit the islanders economically. ==References== ==External links== *http://www.academia.edu/7590777/The_Politics_of_Russo- Japanese_Cultural_Exchange Category:Kuril Islands Category:Irredentism Category:Politics of Japan Category:Politics of Russia
title: Zemlyak
